title: Toyota Innova Hycross Hybrid waiting period reduces to eight months
description: The Toyota Innova Hycross has been a popular choice not just for private buyers but also for fleet owners. According to the latest update, customers booking the Innova Hycross petrol can get their vehicle in around six months, while the more sought-after petrol-hybrid variants can be delivered in around eight months. While these waiting periods may seem high, not too long ago, buyers had to wait for close to a year. Top-spec Hycross ZX has a waiting period of under six months  Not too long ago, the waiting periods were as high as nearly a year Toyota has been adjusting production capacity for the Innova Hycross depending on demand. The company had paused bookings for the top-spec ZX and ZX(O) variants earlier this year due to “overwhelming demand”. However, bookings for these variants resumed in August. The demand for Innova Hycross petrol-hybrid remains comparatively higher, and a majority of the production capacity has been allotted for the petrol-hybrid iteration, say sources.   Toyota Hycross waiting period at dealer level While the above waiting periods have been released by Toyota, according to a quick check with some of the dealers, both petrol and hybrid variants are being delivered sooner than what the company has conveyed.    For example, Innova Hycross petrol variants are being delivered at most outlets within 45 days to two months at most. Also, waiting periods for the Innova Hycross hybrid vary depending on the variant. The Hycross hybrid VX 8-seater, which comes with a second-row bench seat, is in higher demand than the 7-seater model; hence, it commands a waiting period of nearly four months. The VX 7-seater’s waiting period is around three months. The top-spec Innova Hycross ZX range, including the ZX(O), can also be delivered in under six months at most locations, depending on the demand. Disclaimer: Waiting periods are subject to change, depending on the dealer and region. Please check with your local dealership for the exact waiting periods in your area. Toyota Innova Hycross price, powertrain details Entry-level variants of the Toyota Innova Hycross feature a 172hp, 2.0-litre petrol engine mated to an automatic gearbox, while the higher variants come with a 184hp, 2.0-litre petrol engine with strong hybrid tech. Prices for the Innova Hycross start at Rs 19.77 lakh (ex-showroom) for the entry-level pure petrol line-up and Rs 30.98 lakh for the petrol hybrid range. Also see: Toyota Innova Hycross ZX, ZX (O) hybrid bookings reopened again BYD eMax 7 vs Toyota Innova Hycross: how do they stack up Toyota Glanza, Taisor and Hyryder get over Rs 1 lakh year end benefits
author: Akbar Merchant
excerpt: Dealers tell us that the waiting periods are lower at ground level.

html:
Dealers tell us that the waiting periods are lower at ground level.

The Toyota Innova Hycross has been a popular choice not just for private buyers but also for fleet owners. According to the latest update, customers booking the Innova Hycross petrol can get their vehicle in around six months, while the more sought-after petrol-hybrid variants can be delivered in around eight months. While these waiting periods may seem high, not too long ago, buyers had to wait for close to a year.

  1. Top-spec Hycross ZX has a waiting period of under six months 
  2. Not too long ago, the waiting periods were as high as nearly a year

Toyota has been adjusting production capacity for the Innova Hycross depending on demand. The company had paused bookings for the top-spec ZX and ZX(O) variants earlier this year due to “overwhelming demand”. However, bookings for these variants resumed in August. The demand for Innova Hycross petrol-hybrid remains comparatively higher, and a majority of the production capacity has been allotted for the petrol-hybrid iteration, say sources.  

Toyota Hycross waiting period at dealer level

While the above waiting periods have been released by Toyota, according to a quick check with some of the dealers, both petrol and hybrid variants are being delivered sooner than what the company has conveyed.   

For example, Innova Hycross petrol variants are being delivered at most outlets within 45 days to two months at most. Also, waiting periods for the Innova Hycross hybrid vary depending on the variant. The Hycross hybrid VX 8-seater, which comes with a second-row bench seat, is in higher demand than the 7-seater model; hence, it commands a waiting period of nearly four months. The VX 7-seater’s waiting period is around three months.

The top-spec Innova Hycross ZX range, including the ZX(O), can also be delivered in under six months at most locations, depending on the demand.

Disclaimer: Waiting periods are subject to change, depending on the dealer and region. Please check with your local dealership for the exact waiting periods in your area.

Toyota Innova Hycross price, powertrain details

Entry-level variants of the Toyota Innova Hycross feature a 172hp, 2.0-litre petrol engine mated to an automatic gearbox, while the higher variants come with a 184hp, 2.0-litre petrol engine with strong hybrid tech. Prices for the Innova Hycross start at Rs 19.77 lakh (ex-showroom) for the entry-level pure petrol line-up and Rs 30.98 lakh for the petrol hybrid range.
